nodes.description: 2013年12月25日，巴格达Athorien户外市场发生两次同步炸弹爆炸，针对基督徒，造成11人死亡、14人受伤
nodes.support_text: Two bombs first exploded simultaneously in an outdoor market in the Christian section of Athorien in Baghdad.

nodes.description: 同日稍后，巴格达南部Dora社区St. John's罗马天主教教堂附近发生汽车炸弹袭击，爆炸发生在圣诞祈祷结束后，导致27人死亡、56人受伤
nodes.support_text: A few minutes later, about half a mile away, a car bomb went off near St. John's Roman Catholic Church in Baghdad's southern Dora neighborhood.

nodes.description: 此次连环袭击共造成38人死亡、70人受伤，袭击者未宣称责任
nodes.support_text: In total, the bombings targeting the two Christian-populated sites killed 38 and wounded 70.

edges.support_text: A few minutes later, about half a mile away, a car bomb went off near St. John's Roman Catholic Church in Baghdad's southern Dora neighborhood.
